title: Public transport for Round 12 of the 2024 AFL Season
articleContent:
Public transport for Round 12 of the 2024 AFL Season

Events > Sport

Public transport is the best way to get to the game during Round 12 of the 2024 AFL season!

Extra services will run to and from the MCG and Marvel Stadium.

Plan your trip to the game using Journey planner.

Round 12 matches

Collingwood v Western Bulldogs, Marvel Stadium, Friday 31 May at 7:40pm

Hawthorn v Adelaide, MCG, Saturday 1 June at 1:45pm

Geelong v Richmond, GMHBA Stadium, Saturday 1 June at 7:30pm

Before you travel

We strongly encourage you to register your myki. With a registered myki you can protect your myki balance if the card is lost or stolen, check your travel history and manage multiple myki cards in the one account.

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.
articleDescription: Extra public transport services for Round 12 of the 2024 AFL season.
